main.name: Garrett
main.title: Full stack developer
main.description: Iâ€™m an aspiring full stack developer with a keen eye for creating unique UIs, producing quality work.

about.bio: I am a seasoned IT engineer, a SharePoint specialist, a migration engineer, a Power Platform engineer and now I'm working on my skills as a full stack developer.  I love coding, developing, and seeing what else is possible.  I have had a passion about technology since I had my first Atari system when I was 8 years old.  Besides coding and engineering, I have another passion in politics, cigars, and having fun with family and friends.

services.title: Frontend
service: Convert Xd, PSD & JPG files into a responsive and pixel perfect website.
Convert HTML, CSS & Javascript into React App.

services.title: Backend
service: Build A Secure and Authenticated Server.
Deploy a Web App on Vercel, Firebase or Netlify.

portfolio.title: 3D Worlds
portfolio.description: I've really outdone myself now with several 3d worlds using ThreeJS and Skybox pictures.  Some really fun stuff here too.  I've recently added quite a few more new worlds and categorized them..

portfolio.title: Cocktails Index
portfolio.description: Thanks to React and an API, I created a pretty useful cocktail index where you can view details of any known cocktail as well as search for one if you don't see it initially.  It will even tell you how to make the drink and what glass to use.

portfolio.title: Countries index
portfolio.description: Again, thanks to ReactJS and an API, I created a rather useful reference site for looking up countries and details about said country.

portfolio.title: Rain and lightning effect
portfolio.description: Another simple page with some cool rain and lightning cloud effects.

portfolio.title: Thanos Portal
portfolio.description: Welcome to my portal into the Cutlerwater universe.  To infinity and who knows where.

portfolio.title: 3d Orb
portfolio.description: Now this is even cooler I think.  Using threeJS's magic, I created a 3d orbital view of St. Peter's Basilica in Rome.  To use it just click on the orb and move the mouse around and you'll see what I mean.

portfolio.title: Gym Websites
portfolio.description: I'm consolidating two exercise related sites into one.  The first will be my new responsive html site that a public gym could use and the second is my workout tracker.  There is a link on both to go back and forth.  Check them out!

portfolio.title: Crypto App
portfolio.description: Here's something useful, a cryptocurrency app that tracks all the different cryptocurrencies and relates the news about them. I'm trying to educate myself about cryptocurrencies and I figured this would be a great start.  The news part isn't functioning yet though. There's also a link to my budget app.

portfolio.title: Metaverse App
portfolio.description: Here's something different but really has a lot of potential.  It's a decentralized chat app that uses a new kind of login system.  The login requires Metamask or something like it, a third party authentication system.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: A very clean and simple weather app based on React.

portfolio.title: Older Portfolio
portfolio.description: The previous portfolio and links to more projects

portfolio.title: My AIRBNB clone
portfolio.description: I created a clone of the AirBNB site using NextJS and TailwindCSS.  TailwindCSS is awesome!  No need for separate CSS files. This isn't a fully working site, just a clone.

portfolio.title: Padron Cigar Promo
portfolio.description: I created a page to highlight Padron Cigars, hoping to build on it.  I used ReactJS and Styled Components

portfolio.title: Beats Promo
portfolio.description: I created a page to highlight the Beats products, hoping to build on it.  I used ReactJS and Styled Components.
